name: Relations and Property Management bvba
goal:
RELPROM bvba is a management company held by Chris VERHAEGEN with the aim of representing clients with EU or Belgian institutional bodies in the field of financial services (especially pensions policy, tax policy) and social policy (labour market and equal treatment M/W).
Clients include industry associations and corporations from across Europe.
In the fiscal year as reported (2017-09-30) our client base includes : Kreab Gavin Anderson A.B., a public affairs consultancy specialised i.a. in financial services and THird Bridge (London), a research firm into insurance industry

Working languages include : English, French, Dutch and Italian.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Taxation
euInitiatives:

- Further work on solvency of IORPs
